summary: I HAVE OWNED A 2000 GRAND CARAVAN FOR 6 MONTHS AND IT HAS 40 THOUSAND MILES ON IT AND I AM ALREADY HAVING TRANSMISSION PROBLEMS. THIS IS THE 4TH TIME I HAVE HAD TO TAKE IT TO BE LOOKED AT ABOUT THE TRANSMISSION, NOW THE DEALERSHIP SAYS IT NEEDS A TOTALLY NEW TRANSMISSION THIS VAN IS NOT THAT OLD AND DOES NOT HAVE THAT MANY MILES ON IT. I AM STARTING TO THINK I MADE A BAD CHOICE TRADING MY FORD IN FOR A DODGE VAN.  *JB
